con.content: While the internet spreads information faster, it can also spread viruses and mal ware faster, opening companies up to attack.
An increased flow of information can result in information overload, generating more work to sort through and organize all the information.

support.content: As submitting and finding information becomes easier, people upload things they would have previously found irrelevant.

con.content: The right to be forgotten should be postponed before an execution and inspection party/entity are specified.
The right to be forgotten leads to misfunctions of Internet services, such as returning blank pages from search engines and deleting photos on ambiguous situations.

support.content: The role of censor-in-chief is hard to be integrated into commercial companies, and decisions from the technology companies may lead to more controversial disputes.
The frequent deleting issues will exert a considerable amount f additional burden/workload on the Internet Service Providers.

con.content: Citizens have the right to know the truth only if the facts matters to the ones who want to know, and/or it would not interfere the regular life of the persons involved in the to-be-disclosed truth.
The regulation on the right to be forgotten is too hard to take effect in practice.
The act of removing what has happened previously is against the First Amendment on the freedom of speech.

support.content: People have the right to know the truth, especially the past of convicted criminals, whether or not the subjects agree or not.

People who have seen the original post acquired knowledge or point of view regardless of whether the original poster regrets doing so or not. The right to tell others have been propagated to a wider scope, which is no longer the privacy of a single person.

con.content: As there is a rise in the age of company owners, there is no specification for what a technology company is.

support.content: This could include things like video game companies, phone companies, even camera companies because they are all technology companies.

Cross-generational workplaces can be effective but to an extent. One example where it wouldn't be effective is if you have a manager who is 50 years old and has been working at the company for 20 years, and then the company then hires a supervisor (the boss of the manager) who is 25.

pro.content: Using technology to advance our professional communities increases corporate productivity. (Productivity in this scenario is defined by increased participation, efficiency, and effectiveness.)

support.content: Communities foster trust. LinkedIn has 313 million users. (“About LinkedIn”).
Online communities increase participation.

pro.content: The right to be forgotten should be protected since it takes action and efforts to establish new social standard in the progress of civilization.

support.content: European countries and South American countries, such as Argentina have demonstrated efforts in building up the right to be forgotten and it seems to work as people benefit from the protect and care about their records online.

pro.content: The regulation on the right to be forgotten is necessary step towards more civilized Internet world.

support.content: The crime victims or criminals have the right to let go of the past, and the cost to facilitate the process is just a matter of time and efforts. As long as new infrastructor is established, the Internet world will be more desirable.

pro.content: Citizens have the right to know the truth as long as the information was legally acquired.

support.content: The U.S. Supreme Court has held that states cannot pass laws restricting the media from disseminating truthful but embarrassing information—such as the name of a rape victim—as long as the information was legally acquired.

pro.content: The regulation can reform the history of human right as long as it is executed as regulated.
People has the right to be forgotten since teenagers may act immaturely or irrationally, such as hangover night.

support.content: The convicted

The embarrassments of conducts at young age should not exert perpetual influence on the rest of one's life and the right to be forgotten can protect people from getting endless rebuke, consoles or explanations.

pro.content: The aging of society and individuals can and must be used as a resource within the future of our workforce.

support.content: The average age for a technology company founder is rising. It is currently at 40 years of age. This shows the value that older age is bringing into our workforce and future.
Technology companies are being founded by more experienced and aged individuals than before.
